We love a good April Fool’s joke, and so we wanted to remind you about this press release from @CERN. Not from this year, but too awesome to forget about: https://bit.ly/2Vaeq27  #AprilFools #TheForceIsStrongWithThisOne

The LHCb detector at @CERN has potentially found evidence of why our universe exists. By colliding particles, differences in the way particles and antiparticles break down have been recorded. They contain a building block of matter called a charm quark. #2019ES2232
